question: Show novels and short stories about John Smith.
sql_query1:
SELECT Novels.title
FROM Novels
WHERE Novels.Character = "John Smith"
UNION
SELECT ShortStories.title
FROM ShortStories
WHERE ShortStories.Character = "John Smith"
sql_query2:
SELECT Novels.title
FROM Novels
UNION
SELECT ShortStories.title
FROM ShortStories
WHERE ShortStories.Character = "John Smith"
interpretation1: What novels have John Smith and what short stories have the same character?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all novels and also provide a list of short stories with the character John Smith.
